original: 2.3.3. Anāgatavāra🔽Yo rūpakkhandhaṁ parijānissati so vedanākkhandhaṁ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: anāgatavāra  yaḥ rūpa kkhandham parijānissati saḥ vedanā kkhandham parijānissati iti āmantā
translated: ... The Chapter on the Future🔽Will the one who thoroughly knows the form aggregate thoroughly know the feeling aggregate? Yes.

original: Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṁ parijānissati so rūpakkhandhaṁ parijānissatīti? Āmantā.🔽Yo rūpakkhandhaṁ na parijānissati so vedanākkhandhaṁ na parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vedanā kkhandham parijānissati saḥ rūpa kkhandham parijānissati iti āmantā  yaḥ rūpa kkhandham na parijānissati saḥ vedanā kkhandham na parijānissati iti āmantā
translated: Or will the one who thoroughly knows the feeling aggregate thoroughly know the form aggregate? Yes.🔽Will the one who does not thoroughly know the form aggregate not thoroughly know the feeling aggregate? Yes.

original: Yo vā pana vedanākkhandhaṁ na parijānissati so rūpakkhandhaṁ na parijānissatīti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana vedanā kkhandham na parijānissati saḥ rūpa kkhandham na parijānissati iti āmantā
translated: Or will the one who does not thoroughly know the feeling aggregate not thoroughly know the form aggregate? Yes.
